俺の合図を皮切りに、陽動役のラミが飛び出していく。: Starting with my signal, the diversion, Rami, flew out.
ＭＧの駆動音とスピーカーからの声に、\nメイズシフターの注意が一斉にラミへ注がれ:
The sound of the MG’s driving and the voice coming from the speakers...
The Maizsifter’s attention was focused on Rami all at once.
何そのザコい攻撃ぃ！\nンなおっそい攻撃が当たるかっての！:
What kind of stupid attack is that?!
I'm not going to get hit by an attack like that right away!
（大袈裟な動きのおかげで群れの中に隙が生まれてきたな）: (Thanks to her exaggerated movements, there's an opening in the herd.)
このチャンス、逃さない。: I won't let this chance pass me by.
めるを先頭にしてメイズシフター達の中へ突撃！\n俺と白奈はその後ろを追随する――:
With Meguru leading the way, we charge into the maise shifters!
Shirona and I followed behind her――
っ！ メ、メイズシフター達がこちらに迫ってきてます！: ! M-Maiseshifters are closing in on us!
チッ……大人しく陽動に引っかかってくれていればいいものを……！: Tch... I wish they'd just quietly fall for the diversion...!
ラミが気を引いていたメイズシフター達もこっちに戻って来てやがる。\n数は……だい:
The maise shifters that Rami had drawn her attention to are coming back here, too.
There's... about half of them.
迎撃は最低限でいい！ とにかく足を止めるな！\n前だけを見て、ひたすらに飛び続け:
Intercepting is the bare minimum! Just don't stop!
Just look ahead and keep flying!
このっ……邪魔すんな！: Damn it... Don't get in my way!
陽動の役目はもう終わりでしょ！\n後ろの連中はラミが何とかする！:
Your role as a diversion is over!
Rami will take care of the ones behind you!
ラミ！ こっちだ！ 層が薄いところがある！\n俺の指示する敵だけ攻撃しろ！:
Rami! Over here! There’s a thin layer!
Attack only the enemies I command!
今、そっちに敵の情報を送った！: I just sent you the enemy's information!
了解――ってぇっ、数が多すぎるっつの！: Roger――Wait, there's too many of them!
くっ……七彩機とちゆる機の追従先を俺からめる機に変更する！\nめる！ 白奈！ そ:
Ugh... I'm going to change the direction of the Seven-Colored Machine to the one that's going to ensnare me!
Meguru! Shirona! Keep moving!!
めると白奈は包囲の隙間を縫って前進していく。: When I do, Shirona pushes forward through the gaps in the encirclement.
……よし、いいぞ。そのまま突っ込んで包囲を抜けるんだ。: ...Okay, that's good. Just charge in and get out of the encirclement.
って、見送ってる場合じゃない。\nこのままじゃラミが敵の波に呑まれてしまう……！:
Wait, this isn't the time to see her off.
At this rate, Rami will be swallowed up by a wave of enemies...!
ぐっ……ラミの上に乗ってんじゃねえ、クソども！\nそれは俺の権利だろうが！？:
Ugh... Don't get on top of Rami, you bastards!
Isn't that my right!?
いや、おまえにもまだ権利ないからね！？: No, you still don't have the right, you know!?
ラミ！ こっちの方が敵が少ない！ 突破するぞ！: Rami! There aren't many enemies here! Let's break through!
%usernameusernameuserna%さぁ、何で戻ってくんの！\nラミ:
%usernameusernamesuserna%Come on, why are you coming back?!
Rami went out of her way to gather enemies, so take the opportunity to escape!
ここでお前を見捨てちまったら、結婚式挙げられねーだろーが！！: If I abandon you here, there'll be no wedding ceremony!!
なんかいつの間にか、数段くらいすっ飛ばしてるし！！\n%usernameuser:
Before I know it, she's skipping a few steps!!
%usernameusernameuserna%, you like Rami way too much!
今度、一緒に老人ホームの見学に行こうぜ！！: Next time, let's go to the nursing home together!!
――なんて、やり取りをしながら\n俺達はメイズシフターの群れの中を駆け抜けていっ:
――Just like that, as we exchange words.
We raced through the crowd of maise shifters.
